import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete custom field type"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/custom-fields/types/{customFieldTypeId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes an existing custom field type.

**Prerequisites**:
1. Use [GET /api/v1.0/custom-fields/types](/docs/api/custom-fields/list-custom-field-types) to identify the `CustomFieldTypeId` value to delete.

**Workflow Example**:
1. List current custom field types and capture the `CustomFieldTypeId` for the target field.
2. Call this operation with the captured identifier to remove the field definition.

**Minimal Required Fields**: customFieldTypeId path parameter

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"customFieldTypeId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the custom field type to delete. Obtain this value by listing custom field types and reading `Items[].CustomFieldTypeId`.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"listCustomFieldTypes","endpoint":"GET /api/v1.0/custom-fields/types","responseField":"Items[].CustomFieldTypeId"}}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
